article.headline: Charting market cross currents, Nasdaq ventures under 50-day average
article.body: U.S. stocks are mixed early Friday, vacillating as September volatility persists. Against this backdrop, the S&P 500 has weathered its second test of major support (3,328) while the Nasdaq Composite teeters on its the 50-day moving average, currently 10,938. Before detailing the U.S. markets’ wider view, the S&P 500’s hourly chart highlights...
